definitions.definition: To lay upon, as an order or command ; to give an injunction to; to direct with authority ; to order ; to charge .
To prescribe under authority; to ordain .
To prohibit or restrain by a judicial order or decree ; to put an injunction on.

main_definition: ( transitive , chiefly literary ) To lay upon, as an order or command ; to give an injunction to; to direct with authority ; to order ; to charge .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To prescribe under authority; to ordain .
( transitive , law ) To prohibit or restrain by a judicial order or decree ; to put an injunction on.
